slides.statement: We enable every manufacturer to predict and prevent equipment failures, without data scientists.
slides.context: Founded by manufacturing and AI veterans who experienced the problem firsthand.

slides.headline: THE PROBLEM
points: Manufacturers lose $50B annually to unplanned downtime—82% from equipment failures
Maintenance teams are flying blind with scattered data across 15+ disconnected systems
Existing AI solutions require PhD expertise and 6-12 month implementations
slides.statistic: "We spent $2M on sensors but still can't predict when machines will fail." — VP Ops, Fortune 500

slides.headline: OUR SOLUTION
slides.valueProposition: Predictive AI that prevents equipment failures before they happen.
benefits: Connect in minutes: Plug into existing sensors—no new hardware required
Predict with precision: ML models detect issues 72 hours ahead with 94% accuracy
Act with confidence: Clear recommendations prioritized by business impact

trends.title: Sensor Proliferation
trends.description: IoT sensors now cost $0.50 (down from $50 in 2015). Every machine generates continuous data streams.

trends.title: AI Breakthrough
trends.description: Foundation models enable training with 10x less data. Real-time inference now possible at edge.

trends.title: Labor Shortage
trends.description: 2.1M manufacturing jobs unfilled by 2030. Companies must do more with fewer experts.

slides.headline: MARKET OPPORTUNITY

slides.growth: Growing 23% annually as AI adoption accelerates. Source: Gartner 2025 Manufacturing Report
